messages.text: <@U01BZJ2JTML> set the channel purpose: Discussions about reachability analysis with imprecise probabilities
messages.purpose: Discussions about reachability analysis with imprecise probabilities

messages.text: Hi fellas, just thought I’d make a slack channel to discuss prob reachability analysis

elements.text: Hi fellas, just thought I’d make a slack channel to discuss prob reachability analysis

messages.text: I gave a presentation to our research group today about the basic idea. Thought I’d share it here, although I did it in abit of a rush and might be missing a few details.

elements.text: I gave a presentation to our research group today about the basic idea. Thought I’d share it here, although I did it in abit of a rush and might be missing a few details.

messages.text: Also feel free to add anyone else interested in colabing

elements.text: Also feel free to add anyone else interested in colabing

messages.text: I’ve added afew things to the github repo also, including the h-volume, n-d copula type with a gaussian copula constructor and a multivariate p-box type also. Only thing that’s really missing is a descritise function to convert the multivariate p-box into a random set. And then whatever api functions we want to link it to reachabilityAnalysis.jl

elements.text: I’ve added afew things to the github repo also, including the h-volume, n-d copula type with a gaussian copula constructor and a multivariate p-box type also. Only thing that’s really missing is a descritise function to convert the multivariate p-box into a random set. And then whatever api functions we want to link it to reachabilityAnalysis.jl

messages.text: very nice!! i have to leave now but i'll check again at night

elements.text: very nice!! i have to leave now but i'll check again at night

messages.text: im only worried if slack decides to delete the messages in a couple of days ("slack hole")

elements.text: im only worried if slack decides to delete the messages in a couple of days ("slack hole")

messages.text: cool plots. we should discuss the details

elements.text: cool plots. we should discuss the details

messages.text: did you get some feedback from the audience?

elements.text: did you get some feedback from the audience?

messages.text: Mind blown about reachabilityAnalysis.jl. That was new to everyone. I think some were aware of propagating a p-box this way, but the copula/h-volume/dependence part is quite novel. I’ve only seen it in one paper, which is where I got the idea from. Good response overall

elements.text: Mind blown about reachabilityAnalysis.jl. That was new to everyone. I think some were aware of propagating a p-box this way, but the copula/h-volume/dependence part is quite novel. I’ve only seen it in one paper, which is where I got the idea from. Good response overall

messages.text: One comment was about how small the intervals were for the parameters. Is it the case that when they’re too big it explodes?

elements.text: One comment was about how small the intervals were for the parameters. Is it the case that when they’re too big it explodes?

messages.text: I guess mincing is an option?

elements.text: I guess mincing is an option?
